Text:
Close the loop
- my projects are set up with another Zapier Webhook so that issue details are fired off whenever an issue updates
- the Webhook Zap filters for instances where the issue’s status = “Done” or “Canceled”

Send from Airtable to Linear
- I plan, groom, score, and vet features in Airtable
- once all details are in, I fire them off to Linear using a Zapier Webhook
- the Airtable record ID is included in the issue’s description (this is in lieu of custom fields)

Welcome to the community!

Fair warning: Zapier automations are amazing when they work, but they break or have errors semi-frequently, especially with multi-step automations that have dependencies.

Definitely take a "trust, but verify" approach and don't ignore the error alerts.
